price: Ni leurs chairs ni leurs sangs n’atteignent Allah, mais ce qui L’atteint de votre part c’est la piété. Ainsi vous les a-t-Il assujettis afin que vous proclamiez la grandeur d’Allah, pour vous avoir mis sur le droit chemin. Et annonce la bonne nouvelle aux bienfaisants.
arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنكُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمۡ لِتُكَبِّرُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمۡۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lan yanāla al-laha luḥūmuhā walā dimāuhā walākin yanāluhu al-taqwā minkum kadhālika sakharahā lakum litukabbirū al-laha ʿalā mā hadākum wabashiri al-muḥ'sinīna
